Articles.Content: So, I had a look at the 'Show off your awesome KSP pictures!' thread. It had, last I checked, over 800 pages. Someone said (not sure of moderator or the author or someone else) said that an old one was being clogged up. As this is happening again, I thought I'd start a thread for some more KSP pictures (shortened to KSPictures). Post replicas of rockets, space stations, kraken attacks, anything you want from KSP!

I'm trying to get it to 1000 before starting a new one.

So, unless a moderator tells us otherwise (I got permission to make a new pictures thread last year), pictures still go here.

edit. moving link

Edited March 31, 2014 by mobious44
